issues.title: Veterans Affairs
issues.description: Strong advocate for veterans' healthcare, benefits, and support programs, drawing from her personal experience as a disabled veteran

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding affordable healthcare, protecting the Affordable Care Act, and reducing prescription drug costs

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strongly pro-choice, supports protecting abortion access and women's reproductive healthcare

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, and protecting DACA recipients

issues.title: Climate Change
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate action, supports green energy investments and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Gun Control
issues.description: Supports universal background checks, assault weapons ban, and comprehensive gun safety legislation

issues.title: Economic Equity
issues.description: Supports raising minimum wage, protecting workers' rights, and reducing income inequality

issues.title: Education
issues.description: Advocates for increased education funding, student debt relief, and expanding access to higher education
